purpose: Accelerate the reduction of technical debt using AI-driven automation and analysis.
principle: Leverages AI agents to identify, prioritize, and automate the resolution of technical debt in software projects.
reusability: Designed to be integrated into existing developer workflows, providing command-line tools and APIs for automation.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for certain programming languages and frameworks.
name: kwaak
description: Burn through tech debt with AI agents!
highlight: Unique focus on using AI to directly address and manage technical debt in codebases.
